title: Humor & Play

questions.text: The kind of humor that gets me every time is...
choices: Witty, clever jokes and wordplay
Silly, goofy, absurd stuff
Sarcasm and dry humor
Physical comedy and impressions

questions.text: When we're being playful together, I love it when we...
choices: Tease each other and have inside jokes
Get silly and goofy - the weirder the better
Play games or have friendly competitions
Just laugh at random things together

questions.text: If you're trying to make me laugh when I'm in a bad mood...
choices: Silly faces or voices will probably work
A well-timed joke or meme
Just being your goofy self
Honestly, I might need a minute before I can laugh

questions.text: When it comes to teasing and joking around, I...
choices: Love it - roast me and I'll roast you back
Enjoy playful teasing about the right things
Am more sensitive - keep it gentle
Prefer laughing WITH each other, not AT each other

questions.text: Something that would make me laugh really hard with you is...
choices: An inside joke that only we get
Watching something funny together
You doing something unexpectedly silly
Remembering a funny moment we shared

description: Discover what makes you laugh and how you play together.
